title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into a target's mind.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham City into chaos.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker discovers the reality he lives in is a simulated reality created by machines.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Titanic
overview: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over several years finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: A man with a low IQ accomplishes great things in his life and influences historical events.

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman General seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Jurassic Park
overview: Scientists bring dinosaurs back to life using cloned DNA but things go terribly wrong.
